text: Mata arrā ga,(teki no) 2tsu no tai no naka, 1tsu wa anata gata no monodearou, to yakusoku sa reta toki o omoe. Sonotoki anata gata wa busō shinai ichi-tai ga, anata gata no monodearu yō ni to nozonda. Daga arrā wa o jibun no o kotoba ni yori, shinri o shinri to shite tate rare, fushin-sha ga, konzetsu suru koto o nozoma reru
